expert_sections.title: GL Code Mapping: Source Document to ERP Ledger
expert_sections.content: Accurate GL coding is the foundation of reliable financial reporting. DocStandard maps line items from source documents to your chart of accounts using the following standardized approach:

mapping_data.normalization_logic: Parse description keywords; Match against GL account rules; Apply department/class segmentation.
Map charge codes (LTL, FTL, Accessorial) to expense accounts; Split fuel surcharges separately.
Cross-reference SKU to item master; Apply COGS vs. expense classification rules.
Map reason codes to appropriate write-off or adjustment accounts; Validate against original invoice.
Pattern match transaction types (ACH, Wire, Check); Auto-categorize recurring vendors.

expert_sections.title: Three-Way Match Automation
expert_sections.content:
The three-way match (PO → Receipt → Invoice) is critical for AP accuracy but notoriously error-prone when done manually. DocStandard automates this process by:

1. **PO Extraction:** Capturing line items, quantities, unit prices, and payment terms from purchase orders.
2. **Receipt Validation:** Matching goods received notes against PO quantities, flagging discrepancies.
3. **Invoice Reconciliation:** Validating invoice amounts against PO pricing and received quantities.
4. **Exception Flagging:** Automatically surfacing mismatches for human review rather than silent failures.

This process eliminates the 15-20% of invoices that typically require manual intervention due to data entry errors.

expert_sections.title: Audit-Ready Documentation
expert_sections.content:
Financial audits require complete documentation trails. DocStandard maintains:

- **Source Document Archive:** Original PDFs linked to every processed record.
- **Transformation Log:** Complete history of how raw data was normalized and mapped.
- **Approval Workflow:** Timestamped records of exception reviews and approvals.
- **Version Control:** Full history of any corrections or adjustments made post-processing.

This documentation satisfies SOX compliance requirements and reduces audit preparation time by up to 60%.

expert_sections.title: ERP Integration Readiness
expert_sections.content:
DocStandard outputs are designed for seamless ERP import. We support:

**QuickBooks Online/Desktop:**
- IIF import files for batch journal entries
- CSV format for vendor bills and customer invoices
- API-ready JSON for QuickBooks Online integrations

**NetSuite:**
- CSV templates matching SuiteImport specifications
- JSON payloads for SuiteTalk web services
- GL segment mapping for multi-subsidiary environments

**SAP Business One / S/4HANA:**
- DI API compatible XML structures
- Business Partner and Document posting formats
- Cost center and profit center allocation

**Magaya:**
- Accounting module import formats
- Shipment-to-invoice linking
- Multi-currency handling for international freight
